body.name: HyperX SoloCast – USB Condenser Gaming Microphone, for PC, PS5, PS4, and Mac, Tap-to-Mute Sensor, Cardioid Polar Pattern, Great for Streaming, Podcasts, Twitch, YouTube, Discord - White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 17 mins
features: Plug N Play audio recording with USB-C connection: Get quality audio recordings with this easy-to-use USB condenser microphone. The cardioid polar pattern is most sensitive to sound sources in front of the microphone, and reduces background noise.
Hi-Res 24-bit/96 kHz recording: SoloCast supports a high, studio-level bit depth and sampling rate.
Tap-to-Mute sensor with LED status indicator: Simply tap the top of the mic to mute, and the easy-to-see LED indicator lets you spot whether or not you’re broadcasting.
Flexible, adjustable stand: The easy-to-position stand swivels to support a variety of setups. You can even fit it under a monitor if your setup is tight on space.
Boom arm and mic stand threading: Versatile built-in mount adapter fits 3/8-inch and 5/8-inch threads, making it compatible with most mic stands or boom arms.
body.description: For video editors, streamers, and gamers looking for a USB microphone with great sound quality, the HyperX SoloCast is a must have. Get 24-bit, 96kHz recordings with the SoloCast’s high bit depth and sampling rate. It’s Plug N Play with a USB-C connection, making it simple to use, with some of our fan-favorite conveniences like the tap-to-mute sensor and LED mute indicator. The versatile microphone has a flexible, adjustable stand and is also compatible with most boom arms, so it can either sit on your desk or work mounted. Certified by TeamSpeak and Discord and compatible with OBS, XSplit, Streamlabs OBS and a number of other programs, it’s an extremely streamer-friendly microphone.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plug N Play Plug N Play audio recording with USB-C connection. Get quality audio recordings with this easy-to-use USB condenser microphone. Hi-Res 24-bit/96 kHz recording SoloCast supports a high, studio-level bit depth and sampling rate. Tap-to-mute with LED indicator Simply tap the top of the mic to mute, and the easy-to-see LED indicator lets you spot whether or not you’re broadcasting. Flexible, adjustable stand The easy-to-position stand swivels to support a variety of setups. You can even fit it under a monitor if your setup is tight on space.

Arm and mic stand threading Versatile built-in mount adapter fits 3/8-inch and 5/8-inch threads, making it compatible with most mic stands or boom arms. Customizable via Software HyperX NGENUITY Software. Adjust volume level and upgrade firmware to take advantage of 24-bit, 96kHz recording. More great features are on the way. Multi-device compatibility Get great sound whether you’re connecting to a PC, PS5, PS4, or Mac. Works with Discord, TeamSpeak, Streamlabs OBS, OBS Studio, and XSplit Polar Pattern Cardioid polar pattern is most sensitive to sound sources in front of the microphone, and reduces background noise.

Can the status LED be configured on the SoloCast? The status LED behavior on the SoloCast (eg. LED on when muted versus LED on when unmuted) is configurable via a firmware update. Please visit our support page for the appropriate firmware update for your microphone. Which third party boom arms / mic stands can be used with the SoloCast? The SoloCast comes with a built-in dual threaded mount hole allowing for use with both 3/8" and 5/8" thread sizes, accomodating most mic stands / boom arms on the market. How long is the USB cable that comes with the SoloCast? The included cable is 2 meters (~6.5 feet) in length, USB C on the side of the microphone and USB A on the system side. Is there a way to keep the SoloCast muted between system restarts or default it to mute? The SoloCast will default to be unmuted when it first turns on. The mute status is not stored within the microphone, so it resets on power loss. This can also occur when the system enters Sleep, depending on how your system is configured. Is the SoloCast compatible with Xbox systems? The SoloCast is not compatible with Xbox systems. The SoloCast is officially compatible with PC, PS4, PS5, and MacOS systems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and good quality + plug and play.
reviews.reviewText: Plug and Play, sounds is great if you go into microphone settings in windows and change the quality cause the standard quality windows sets is bad.There is no way of adjusting volume on the microphone itself. Which isn't really needed, but could be a good feature. This is the cheaper version of the product so understandable.Overall, absolutely worth the purchase for gaming and for meetings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Under-rated to be honest In love with it.
reviews.reviewText: It's the best microphone I've ever had. I will never buy another microphone again. I never liked standalone mics because they either looked junky or took up too much space but this microphone makes my desk look fancier and just cleaner in general. I've bought a binaural headset from this company before and loved that as well but the mic wouldn't pick up me singing because it was meant for gaming. This microphone picks up every hum sound I make but doesn't pick up my keyboard (unless the sensitivity is up too high). It also picks up from far away I can be across the room and people will still be able to hear me. The microphone quality is honestly amazing especially for the price. I'm also in love with the mute button sensor. Just a tap and it turns my microphone off completely. I never had a single problem with the microphone randomly leaking my voice at all which is great. I don't have a single complaint about this microphone at all. The cord is also long enough to be able to reach the lower usb ports on my pc which I was slightly worried about so if you have a setup the cord length will not be an issue. I'm very happy with this microphone :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for value
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing mic and the quality is great. Arrived on time and works perfectly on a boom arm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Little Condenser Mic
reviews.reviewText: This microphone is amazing for its price. It feels very premium and weighs quite a lot for its size. It has a touch sensitive button for muting and unmuting with a corresponding red light on the front of the mic to indicate if it’s muted or not. The top half of the microphone is made out of metal which makes it premium to the touch. It also uses USB Type C technology for the output which is great to see on these types of products. If your using the cables that comes with it make sure it isn’t by something that emits strong wireless signals. For example if it’s by a router, it will interfere with the cable and cause a weird noise in your audio.The mic it self sounds amazing. The microphone does pick up a good amount of background noise so please keep that in mind. If you are gonna pick this microphone up I recommend getting a boom arm for better voice pickup and getting a free software like VoiceMeeter that can make the mic sound even better. It will make it sound like a podcast mic and get rid of the background noise. I would also consider getting the Hyper-X software for it.

reviews.reviewerName: Fraternite Notre Dame holiday gift collection
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality mic and read this
reviews.reviewText: This product is really good and if you go into settings if you are in pc and you test the mic it says that it’s not going very high volume but it is a high quality volume and the person that you are talking to with the mic can hear you and it come set up which is amazing and it very simple all you do is plug in the usb-c cord into the mic and into your pc and there you go it’s all set up. You might have to change your input device for audio if you are on pc but idk if you have to on Xbox or PlayStation because I got it for pc but you might have to for pc. If the light in the mic is red than you are unmuted and if it is off then you are muted. There is a mute button for it on the top of the mic is how you mute. For further instructions read the manual.

reviews.reviewText: The stand is short end up buying an arm to get it close to me. It also picks up any sounds of clicking and what not. Very good for the price. I love the mute button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear and simple
reviews.reviewText: Pretty clear output for my game chat needs. No need to download drivers just plug and play.

Qualidade do microfone é realmente do que se espera do mesmo, cumpre o que promete. A parte negativa foi a embalagem amassada no ato de entrega. No mais, o produto estava em perfeito estado e depois com alguns ajustes ficou ainda melhor para uso, comprem sem medo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Um microfone sensacional por um preço justo
reviews.reviewText: Esse microfone é um achado. É de altíssima qualidade, e o preço não é impeditivo. Não tenho nada de mal a falar dele, cumpre muito bem o que promete, e me parece bem robusto. A construção é quase toda de plástico, mas não é plástico vagabundo. Não deixando cair e cuidando bem, acredito que dure bons anos.O único ponto é que você precisa de um ambiente com tratamento e isolamento acústico, pois é um microfone que capta literalmente todos os sons. Tudo bem que ele capta mais na frente do que dos lados e atrás, mas ainda sim dá para ouvir o som de moto passando na rua, por exemplo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good mic, fix for mute blinking light
reviews.reviewText: Very good mic, some reviews say that they don't like the fact that the led light on the mic keeps blinking when muted but if you just install the corsair software and do the update now when you're muted te light is just turned off.

Tiene un defecto con windows 11, se debe actualizar el firmware del micrófono para sacar todo su potencial, pero hay que tener cuidado, si no se hace la actualización en windows 10 específicamente, puede generar errores o dejar inutilizable el micrófono, fuera de eso la calidad es excelente y la calidad debería ser superior al Hyperx Quadcast, la única desventaja seria que solo tiene modo cardiode, si solo es para una persona es superior en calidad al Quadcast a lo que he probado, solo le falta un filtro anti pop y un soporte araña o brazo.Me deja un sabor agridulce debido a que el único problema fue el firmware, pero hablando de la calidad de audio es excelente.

With its price tag you wouldn’t expect the greatest quality. I am pleasantly surprised. This mic doesn’t have the features you’d get in most mics but for what it does it’s an exceptional job. I really like hyper x’s idea in stripping down a mic to its basic purpose for budget friendly mics. I’ve had compliments of people who have 200 dollar mics and asking how much I spent on it. You’ll need a bit of software tweaking for stuff like streaming (equalizers compressors blah blah blah). I would 100% recommend this to my friends as a budget friendly mic. It doesn’t sound or feel cheap at all. The touch to mute is something I really love. I use a pop filter on this because it does pick up some background noise. The multi threaded mount makes it so much easier in picking a mic stand due to it supporting different kinds. All in all, good sound quality, mountability, easy to use, and durable (I’ve had this for over a year without damage). When I say durable I say this in the mindset of treating a mic properly. I have dropped this a few times had a water bottle leak on it and it surprisingly still works just as fine. Normally I’d ask for more features but I understand the purpose of keeping the price tag down. So for it’s purpose I rate this 19 compliments out of 5 vrchat buddies
